description: This file defines Flask route handlers for device management, including CRUD operations, validation, and MongoDB interactions.

classes.name: DevicesCollection
classes.description: Flask MethodView for handling collection-level device operations (list and create).

classes.name: DeviceItem
classes.description: Flask MethodView for handling individual device operations (retrieve, update, delete).

methods.name: _validate_ipv4
methods.description: Validates if a string is a valid IPv4 address.

methods.name: _validate_device_payload
methods.description: Validates device payload data for required fields and correct formats.

methods.name: _mongo_collection
methods.description: Initializes and returns the MongoDB collection based on environment variables.

methods.name: _sanitize
methods.description: Removes MongoDB internal '_id' field from documents before returning.
